snippet: PITT--David E. Died February 24. He was 67. He is mourned by his wife, Martha Green-ough; children, Katharine and James; sister, Debra Pitt; brother, Timothy Pitt; and sister-in-law, Lisa Pitt. A private memorial is planned....

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PITT, DAVID E

lead_paragraph: PITT--David E. Died February 24. He was 67. He is mourned by his wife, Martha Green-ough; children, Katharine and James; sister, Debra Pitt; brother, Timothy Pitt; and sister-in-law, Lisa Pitt. A private memorial is planned.
